:v-model.description: The initial value of the binding value, which is bound in both directions
:v-model.description_zh: 绑定value初始值，此值是双向绑定的

name.description: The stepper identifier is returned in the change callback
name.description_zh: 步进器标识符，在change回调返回

value.description: The value used for two-way binding, set to the default min value (minimum) at initialization.
value.description_zh: 用于双向绑定的值，初始化时设置设为默认min值(最小值)

min.description: The minimum value that can be entered by the user

max.description: The maximum value that can be entered by the user

step.description: Step size, the value of each addition or subtraction, support decimal values, if you need a decimals
step.description_zh: 步长，每次加或减的值， 支持小数值，如需小数

integer.description: Whether you can enter only positive integers

disabled.description: Whether to disable the action, including the input box, add or subtract buttons
disabled.description_zh: 是否禁用操作，包括输入框，加减按钮

disabledInput.description: Whether to prohibit the input box

asyncChange.description: Whether to enable asynchronous change, you need to manually control the input value after it is enabled
asyncChange.description_zh: 是否开启异步变更，开启后需要手动控制输入值

inputWidth.description: Enter the width of the box, in px

showMinus.description: Whether or not to display a reduction button

showPlus.description: Whether to display the Add button

decimalLength.description: The number of decimal places displayed

longPress.description: Whether to allow long press to add or subtract
longPress.description_zh: 是否允许长按进行加减

color.description: The color of the input box text and the plus or minus button icons
color.description_zh: 输入框文字和加减按钮图标的颜色

buttonSize.description: The size of the button, width and other values in px, and the height of the input box are the same as this value
buttonSize.description_zh: 按钮大小，宽高等于此值，单位px，输入框高度和此值保持一致

bgColor.description: The background color of the input box and button
bgColor.description_zh: 输入框和按钮的背景颜色

cursorSpacing.description: Specify the distance between the cursor and the keyboard to prevent the keyboard from blocking the input box, in px
cursorSpacing.description_zh: 指定光标于键盘的距离，避免键盘遮挡输入框，单位px

disablePlus.description: Whether to disable the Add button

disableMinus.description: Whether to disable the reduction button

iconStyle.description: The style of the plus or minus button icon

events.name: focus
events.description: The input box gets the focus trigger (in case the button is clickable), in the form of an object
events.description_zh: 输入框得到焦点触发(按钮可点击情况下)，对象形式
events.params: value：输入框当前值，name：步进器标识符

events.name: blur
events.description: Triggered when the input box loses focus, in the form of an object
events.description_zh: 输入框失去焦点时触发，对象形式
events.params: value：输入框当前值，name：步进器标识符

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the content of the input box changes, in the form of an object
events.description_zh: 输入框内容发生变化时触发，对象形式
events.params: value：输入框当前值，name：步进器标识符

events.name: overlimit
events.description: Triggered when the range threshold is exceeded
events.params: type：（minus已达最小值，plus已达最大值）
